attributes.action: The people of the uk petition the government to allow home grown Cannabis use.
attributes.additional_details: As I am paralysed down my right side I use Cannabis for my pain relief and muscle spasms. It also helps my anxiety and copd with my breathibg. Do you realise how many people in the uk use home grown cannabis. Its time our government caught up with the rest of the world And decriminalise cannabis as its a harmless Herb with so many benefits if we leave the EU 🇪🇺 then we will fight for scotlands inde ref 2 and millions of Cannabis User's will back this in Scotland.
attributes.background:
We the people of the uk petition the uk government to allow home grown Cannabis without a license as its not a dangerous or poison plant. As its a medicinal weed.
Cannabis has never killed anyone. But has cured many ailments. Admin /Founder. Legalise Cannabis Scotland UK 🇬🇧.
